seo.title: Adopting Bitcoin – A Lightning Summit 2021
seo.description: Bringing together the Bitcoin and Lightning Network communities with local actors in El Salvador on November 16-18  to work on the mission to adopt Bitcoin successfully. The conference is not-for-profit and all proceeds will be donated to Lightning Network development.
seo.keywords: bitcoin, adopting bitcoin, el salvador, conference, lightning, lightning network
seo.speakerDescription: Meet {name} of {company} on November 16-18 in San Salvador

header.title: Adopting Bitcoin
header.subtitle: A Lightning Summit in El Salvador

jointhenetwork.title: Adopting Bitcoin is coming back to San Salvador.
jointhenetwork.text1: The Bitcoin Law of El Salvador created the most Bitcoin friendly environ- ment in the world with millions of users and thousands of companies using the Bitcoin network in daily transactions.
jointhenetwork.text2: This novel situation comes with both, the challenge to onboard users, and the opportunity to learn from them for the benefit of the entire ecosys- tem - from protocol and application devs to entrepreneurs and investors.
jointhenetwork.text3: A successful adoption of Bitcoin at this scale will be a historic milestone that will benefit both Salvadorans and the Bitcoin ecosystem for years to come, and serve as a blueprint for peoples that want to follow the foot- print of Salvadorans.

locations.title: IN THE HEART OF THE COUNTRY

earlyAdopters.title: NUMBER GO UP
earlyAdopters.text: We‘ve got our own „halving“ at work, get in early get the better price.

tickets.otherConferences:
Get ready for a full week of Bitcoin events!

Bitcoiners from around the world will be flocking to El Salvador for our flagship event "Adopting Bitcoin" -- the first global Lightning Summit in more than two years.
There will be several other events taking place during the same week. Most notably LABitConf.com, with a hackathon starting Nov 15, and a business conference starting Nov 18.
(NOTE: you will need to purchase separate tickets to attend LABitConf)

If you are planning a satellite event, please reach out, so that we can coordinate on behalf of all visitors and attendees.
